entry.title: COLD BREW | MEDIUM DARK ROAST
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type:
Price: 500.00

Every sip of this 100% Arabica coffee is deliciously rich. Relax or recharge with the smooth, balanced brew of our medium roast specialty coffee that you can make any way you like. How about a splash of coconut water for a tropical Cafe Colada? Or a bit of orange juice for a Cold Fashioned? If you prefer something colder, add ice for a classic Iced Coffee.

entry.title: Baarbara Estate
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type: Coffee
Price: 250.00 - 400.00 (2 variants)

Every sip of this 100% Arabica coffee is as smooth as your favourite milk chocolate, with only a hint of raisin. The rich caramel undertones of this medium roast coffee are best savoured during your daily break.

entry.title: Mellow Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type:
Price: 250.00 - 400.00 (2 variants)

Every sip of this 100% Arabica coffee is filled with a gentle warmth. Nutty and delicious, this blend leaves chocolaty notes lingering on the tongue. Sip on this delightful cup at any time to decompress from the hustle and bustle of the day.

entry.title: Mellow Blend | Box Of 5 Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Third Wave Coffee Roasters
Type:
Price: 200.00

Every sip is filled with a gentle warmth. Nutty and delicious, this blend leaves chocolatey notes lingering on the tongue.

A gentle pick-me-up for any time of the day, this warm blend brings to mind warm conversations and cozy reading nooks. Paired with fresh cookies and crumbly pies, this versatile blend can put a spring in your step on evenings that follow lazy afternoons.

Each box contains 5 Easy Coffee Bags.

entry.title: Baarbara Estate | Box Of 5 Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Third Wave Coffee Roasters
Type:
Price: 200.00

Every sip is as smooth as your favorite milk chocolate with only a hint of raisin. The rich caramel undertones make this coffee a delicious staple to your pantry.

Grown along the verdant Chandra Dhrona hills of Chikmangalur, Baarbara Estate coffee is the culmination of 120 years of family tradition at the MG Plantations. This single origin, shade-grown coffee has a distinct character imparted by the beautiful and wild hills it thrives upon.

Each box contains 5 Easy Coffee Ba

entry.title: Karadykan Estate
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type:
Price: 250.00 - 400.00 (2 variants)

Every sip of this 100% Arabica coffee strides with a decadent nuttiness, balanced against bright, sweet cherries that are canopied by caramel notes. Refresh your evenings with this balanced and fruity cup.

entry.title: Wake Me Up Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type:
Price: 250.00 - 400.00 (2 variants)

Every sip of this 100% Arabica coffee is deliciously rich. This full-bodied, intense blend packs a punch and promises to get you up and going. It’s the ideal cup for hectic, hustle-filled days.

entry.title: Speciality Single Origin Chikmagalur Region
entry.summary:
Vendor: Third Wave Coffee Roasters
Type:
Price: 590.00 - 1060.00 (8 variants)

Situated in the beautiful Chikmagalur region of Karnataka, we are proud producers of hand-picked and sun-dried Arabica coffee. Our coffee plants grow alongside pepper, cacao, and cardamom, creating a vibrant blend of flavors. When you savor a cup of our coffee, you'll experience the delightful combination of sweet honey and raisin. And to add a touch of fruity goodness, there's a juicy peach note that perfectly balances the overall taste. It's a coffee that's carefully crafted to deliver a truly satisfying and enjoyable experience.

entry.title: Speciality Single Origin Bababudangiri Region
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type:
Price: 590.00 - 1060.00 (8 variants)

Embark on a remarkable journey through the rich heritage of coffee cultivation in the hallowed grounds of Baba Budan Giri hills. This renowned destination, named after the legendary merchant Baba Budan, who deftly transported precious coffee seeds from Yemen, stands as the embodiment of India's esteemed coffee culture.

Immerse yourself in our exceptional roast, where you will discover a delightful interplay of flavors. Experience the gentle sweetness of juicy passionfruit balanced by the lively brightness of pineapple. As the temperature gradually descends, a captivating essence of richer molasses emerges, offering a truly indulgent sensation.

This coffee is meticulously crafted through a natural processing method, wherein the coffee beans are dried alongside the cherry, resulting in a remarkable symphony of complex, fruity, and sweet flavors. Only the finest, fully ripened cherries are meticulously handpicked, expertly sorted, and sun-dried on African raised beds, ensuring a pristine and flawless quality.

entry.title: Monsoon Malabar
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type: Dark Roast
Price: 540.00 - 1080.00 (8 variants)

Our Monsoon Malabar coffee is an homage to a historical process originating from the long sea journeys in the days of the British Raj. Each cup is packed with bold flavours, complemented by strong, nutty, dark chocolate notes. Sip on this for a perfectly versatile cup that can be enjoyed any time of the day. Our suggestion? Keep a second bag of our Monsoon Malabar coffee handy because you’ll definitely want more.

entry.title: Signature South Indian Filter Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type:
Price: 540.00 - 860.00 (8 variants)

Paying tribute to the original South Indian coffee, we bring you our take on the same. The potent burnt caramel notes of our Arabica Washed coffee marry well with the syrupy texture of our Robusta Natural coffee to give this blend its powerful yet familiar flavour. It holds its own with milk and sugar and excels as an espresso or in a Moka Pot.

entry.title: French Roast
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type:
Price: 540.00 - 860.00 (8 variants)

Born in Karnataka, the misty green Nilgiris form the majestic home of this exquisite dark roast coffee. Every sip is intensely full-bodied with notes of cocoa and a bitter undertone. Sip on this delicious cup and transport yourself to a sunny day at a Parisian cafe.

entry.title: El Diablo Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: thirdwavecoffeeroasterscom
Type:
Price: 540.00 - 1080.00 (8 variants)

Maybe our house blend resembles a dessert more than coffee, and maybe we heartily agree with that. Big-bodied, well-structured and complex, it's what fuels our dynamic team at Third Wave Coffee. Potent on its own, positively provocative with milk or cream, this is a coffee that delights with every sip.
